Structs/IndicatorPositionConstants.html#.name: hidingConstant
Structs/IndicatorPositionConstants.html#.abstract: The value to hide the menu, when restoring the boomerang.

Structs/IndicatorPositionConstants.html.name: IndicatorPositionConstants
Structs/IndicatorPositionConstants.html.abstract: The constants that will be used to animate the indicator

Protocols/CariocaIndicatorConfiguration..name: iconMargins(for:)
Protocols/CariocaIndicatorConfiguration..abstract: The margins for the icon, depending on the edge

Protocols/CariocaGestureManagerDelegate..name: didSelectItem(at:)
Protocols/CariocaGestureManagerDelegate..abstract: The user did select an item at index

Protocols/CariocaDelegate.html#/s:11Cari.name: cariocamenu(_:didSelect:at:)
Protocols/CariocaDelegate.html#/s:11Cari.abstract: The user selected a menu item. The menu will close and hide.

Protocols/CariocaDataSource.html#/s:11Ca.name: isOffscreenAllowed
Protocols/CariocaDataSource.html#/s:11Ca.abstract: Can the menu go offscreen with user’s gesture ? (true)

Protocols/CariocaDataSource.html#/s:11Ca.name: indicatorPosition
Protocols/CariocaDataSource.html#/s:11Ca.abstract: The indicator’s initial position, in %. Top : 0%, Center: 50%, Bottom: 100%.

Protocols/CariocaDataSource.html.name: CariocaDataSource
Protocols/CariocaDataSource.html.abstract: DataSource protocol for filling up the menu

Protocols/CariocaGestureManagerDelegate..name: CariocaGestureManagerDelegate
Protocols/CariocaGestureManagerDelegate..abstract: Forwards the events between CariocaMenu and CariocaGestureManager

Protocols/CariocaIndicatorConfiguration..name: CariocaIndicatorConfiguration
Protocols/CariocaIndicatorConfiguration..abstract: Required parameters to create a custom indicator view

Extensions/UIRectEdge.html#/s:SC10UIRect.name: opposite()
Extensions/UIRectEdge.html#/s:SC10UIRect.abstract: Returns the left/right opposite. If other, returns the same value.

Extensions/Selector.html#/s:10ObjectiveC.name: pannedFromScreenEdge
Extensions/Selector.html#/s:10ObjectiveC.abstract: Gesture for panning from any screen edge

Extensions/Selector.html#/s:10ObjectiveC.name: tappedIndicatorView
Extensions/Selector.html#/s:10ObjectiveC.abstract: Gesture when the user taps the indicator view to display the menu

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ca.name: addCariocaGestureHelpers(_:width:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ca.abstract: Adds Gesture helper views in the container view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ca.name: insets()
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ca.abstract: Safe way to get the insets of the view, depending on iOS version.

Enums/CariocaIcon.html#/s:11CariocaMenu0.name: emoji
Enums/CariocaIcon.html#/s:11CariocaMenu0.abstract: Emoji, but in reality it can be whatever string that fits in the view

Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: none
Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The indicators will always return where they were let.

Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: horizontal
Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The indicator will return always on the original edge.

Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: vertical
Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The indicator will return always on the original Y position. It may switch from Edge.

Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: originalPosition
Enums/BoomerangType.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The indicator will always come back to it’s original position

Classes/CariocaIconView.html#/s:11Carioc.name: display(icon:)
Classes/CariocaIconView.html#/s:11Carioc.abstract: Displays an icon in the view. Only the required subview (label/imageview/?) will be displayed.

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView/AnimationSt.name: onHold
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView/AnimationSt.abstract: The indicator is on hold, the menu is closed

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: originalEdge
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: The original edge. Used when boomerang is not .none

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: iconConstraints
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: The constraints applied to the iconview. Can be updated later with custom configuration

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: state
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: Status of the indicator animations. Avoid double animations issues

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: verticalConstant(for:hostHeight:height:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: Calculates the Y constraint based on percentage.

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/c:@M@.name: draw(_:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Draws the shape, depending on the edge.

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: positionValues(_:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: Calls the positionConstants() with all internal parameters

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: repositionXAfterRotation(_:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: When the hostView has rotated, re-apply the constraints.

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: show(edge:hostView:isTraversingView:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: Show the indicator on a specific edge, by animating the horizontal position

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: restore(hostView:boomerang:initialPosition:firstStepDuration:firstStepDone:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: Retore the indicator on it’s original edge position

Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.name: moveTo(index:heightForRow:)
Classes/CariocaIndicatorView.html#/s:11C.abstract: Move the indicator to a specific index, by updating the top constraint value

Classes/CariocaMenuContainerView.html#/s.name: topConstraint
Classes/CariocaMenuContainerView.html#/s.abstract: The top constraint. Used to move the menu’s Y position

Classes/CariocaMenuContainerView.html#/s.name: addBlurView(style:)
Classes/CariocaMenuContainerView.html#/s.abstract: Adds the blur view as a subview

Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.name: originalScreeenEdgePanY
Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.abstract: The Y position in which the ScreenEdgePan started.

Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.name: internalSelectedIndex
Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.abstract: Internal selection index, used to check index changes.

Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.name: makeEdgePanGestures()
Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.abstract: Create the required gestures depending on the edges

Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.name: topYConstraint(yLocation:originalScreeenEdgePanY:menuHeight:heightForRow:selectedIndex:yRange:isOffscreenAllowed:)
Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.abstract: Calculates the y top constraint, to move the menu

Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.name: matchingIndex(yLocation:menuYPosition:heightForRow:numberOfMenuItems:)
Classes/CariocaGestureManager.html#/s:11.abstract: Calculates the menu’s matching index based on Y position

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: hostView
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The view in which the menu will be displayed

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: selectedIndex
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The selected index of the menu. Default: 0

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: addInHostView()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: Adds the menu’s container view in the host view

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: bringToFront()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: Bring the indicator on top of all views

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: hostViewDidRotate()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: Called from the hostview, if a rotation has been detected.

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.name: tappedIndicatorView(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.abstract: Tap gesture event received. Forwards parameters to GestureManager, to simulate a Pan gesture.

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: willOpenFromEdge(edge:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: Menu will open. Forwards call to openFromEdge

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: didUpdateSelectionIndex(_:selectionFeedback:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The selection index was updated, while user panning in the view

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.name: didSelectItem(at:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:11CariocaMen.abstract: The user did select a menu item

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.abstract: Cell for row. Forwarded to the controller, with the extra edge parameter.

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.abstract: Number of sections. Cannot be updated for now, as the menu’s tableView only supports 1 section

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.name: tableView(_:heightForRowAt:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@CariocaMe.abstract: Takes the specified heightForRow passed in the initialiser

Classes/CariocaIconView.html.name: CariocaIconView
Classes/CariocaIconView.html.abstract: Displays a CariocaIcon, whatever the type of icon

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
